cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 2.8)

if (WITH_TESTS)

# Currently protocol tests build correctly only with protobuf-lite.
# TODO: Fix protocol tests so that they build with full protobuf.

if (NOT DEBUG_PROTOBUF)


ADD_NG_TEST(proto_mysqlx-t
  proto_mysqlx-t.cc
  proto_mysqlx_xplugin-t.cc
  proto_mysqlx_crud-t.cc
  proto_mysqlx_msg-t.cc)

# For headers generated by protobuf
target_include_directories(proto_mysqlx-t PRIVATE
  ${PROTOBUF_INCLUDE_DIR}
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/.."
)

# For the auth_mysql41.h and auth_sha256.h header
target_include_directories(proto_mysqlx-t PRIVATE
    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/mysqlx
)

# add dpenednecy on the target which generates protobuf sources
# used by unit tests

add_dependencies(proto_mysqlx-t ${target_proto_mysqlx})


endif(NOT DEBUG_PROTOBUF)
endif(WITH_TESTS)
